channel.title: Stereotypes
channel.description:
"I'm a guy, so I only want to get into your pants."
This one stereotype is the one that pisses me off the most. True, most guys simply want only that. And as a result of this stereotype it has hard for most girls to believe that the guy in question simply wants to just be your friend. Not every guy is like that, not all of us are assholes.
The entire concept of stereotyping is just wrong.
Here are some bullshit ones =\
[code] I don't eat much, so i must be anorexic
I'm skinny, so I must be bulimic.
I'm emo, so I must cut my wrists.
I'm black, so I must be on welfare.
I'm Hispanic, so I must be dirty.
I'm Asian, so I must love math.
I'm Jewish, so I must be greedy.
I'm gay, so I must have AIDS.
I'm a lesbian, so I must live in San Francisco.
I'm Arab, so I must be a terrorist.
I'm a single mom, so I must be a slut.
I'm old, so I probably cant drive.
I'm overweight, so I most likely have a problem with self control.
I'm religious, so I must shove my beliefs down your throat.
I'm republican, so I must not care about poor people.
I'm democrat, so I must not believe in being responsible.
I'm from the south, so I must be white trash.
I take anti-deppressants, so I must be crazy.
I'm a guy, so I only want to get into your pants.
I'm a woman, so I must think irrationally.
I'm Irish, so I must have a bad drinking problem.
I'm Indian, so I must own a 7-11.
I'm Native American, so I must dance around a fire screaming like a savage, or be apart of a gaming casino.
I dont live with my child, so I must be a dead beat dad.
I'm athletic, so I must be stupid.
I'm a prep, so I must eat and breathe Abercrombie and Fitch.
I'm a teenager, so I must drink and do drugs.
I'm a cheerleader or dancer, so I must be a whore.
I'm a punk, so I must do drugs.
I'm young, so I must be naive.
I'm rich, so I must be a snob, conceided.
I wear black, so I must be gothic.
I smell, so I must be a hobo.
i'm a skater so i must be an anarchist
I'm only 15, so I must not know what love is.
I'm blonde, so i must be stupid.
Im bi so i must be looking at you in a sexual way
I'm pretty and i flirt, so i must not be a virgin
I'm Straight Edge , So if you aren't edge i must hate you
I'm gay/lesbian, I must be a sexual predator.
I'm scene, so I must hate you if your not.
I have a family who isn't hurting for anything, so therefore I must not work for anything in my life.
my parents are gay/lesbian,so i must be gay/lesbian
I don't believe in God, I must love Satan.
I'm liberal, so I must hate anyone who's not.
I'm white, so I must be a racist.
I'm a girl, so I must have no common sense.
i'm popular, so i must easily give into peer pressure
i'm gothic, I must hate life and want to die
I am diffrent, i must be dangerous
I'm smart, I must do all the work for you
I'm short, I must not be as good as everyone else
I'm in marching band and go to band camp, I must do all the stuff in American Pie: Band Camp
I'm a girl, I must just want to make out with guys
I'm extroverted, I must not know how to shut up
I'm talkative, I must be ADHD
I'm friendly, I must just flirt with everyone
I'm academic, I must not ever play sports outside
I'm a loner, so I must have no friends.
I'm white, so I must be ignorant of racial issues. [/code]
The point that I am trying to make with this post is that these stereotypes exist only because people are uneducated. If more people understood other cultures then these stereotypes would become irrelevant and fade into obscurity.

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

Some of those are somewhat accurate…

I’m Irish, so I must have a bad drinking problem.
I’m Indian, so I must own a 7-11
I’m Asian, so I must love math
I’m old, so I probably cant drive

Those are all fairly accurate… i mean… ive seen alot of old people drive INTO buildings, as in going through the front door.

Read full topic

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

Stereotypes are so ridiuclous they are funny, i dont laugh because im racist, i laugh because whatever is being presumed is so outrageously over the top, that only a retard would believe it.

but what pisses me off are people who use stereotypes, “omg he called me black, im going to sue”.

AND FAKING FEMINISTS, GOD DAMN, DIAF!

Read full topic

@Rambit_Td wrote:

I’m Straight Edge , So if you aren’t edge i must hate you

I’m Straight Edge myself and people get pissed when I hang with my good friends… dudes I love like brothers almost… that aren’t.

I hate when girls tag all guys as horny just because most guys are. Not true. They also compare us to all other guys thinking there is no difference between us.

Black kid:I can’t even play bass.
Cartman:Sure you can, ur black all black people can play bass.
BK plays a good bassline

but personally i think stereotypes prove what an idiot a person is another reason why i h8 teh world and the world hates me
(no im not emo, i just hate the world ;D)

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Most White people are Catholic

Oh god. Not the pineapples again.

Read full topic

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @Shinoda Shinoda
item.description:
@Shinoda wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:21, topic:3300”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=3859.msg41744#msg41744 date=1149110101]
I’m not sure why you’re flaming me instead of responding with a scathing witticism. Perhaps you are wondering what prejuidice means? My point is that saying everyone in a certain community is a racist is making a generalization. It’s the same kind of generalization that white people in the boonies of New Hampshire make when they say all black people are crack dealers.
[/quote]

Lol most of the white people in the boonies of new hampshire are complete morons. It’s okay to make general assumptions, but not to go overboard.

iplox makes a point too, but it’s never the case. Everyone isn’t always this way. Except… all Black people are black people lol, you could say that. General assumptions are okay by using the word ‘most’. Most jewish people are smart. Most White people are Catholic. Most governments suck.

Unless you say, ALL black people are bad or something dumb like that. Then I would call that sterotyping.

PaulT prejudism means Pre Judging. I’m not prejudging, I’ve judged and been around the people that I’m judging, and I’m judging after I’ve met them, talked to them, and found out how stupid they are. Not all people from NH are dumb, but a lot of them are. I went to New York city, and they are much smarter. Would you call that prejudging? Nope, cause I have been there, spoken to the people, and found out they are intelligent.

~Ron[/quote]

Exactly my point. An educated statement is completely opposite than a blind assumption.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ron wrote:

PaulT:

I’m not sure why you’re flaming me instead of responding with a scathing witticism. Perhaps you are wondering what prejuidice means? My point is that saying everyone in a certain community is a racist is making a generalization. It’s the same kind of generalization that white people in the boonies of New Hampshire make when they say all black people are crack dealers.

Lol most of the white people in the boonies of new hampshire are complete morons. It’s okay to make general assumptions, but not to go overboard.

iplox makes a point too, but it’s never the case. Everyone isn’t always this way. Except… all Black people are black people lol, you could say that. General assumptions are okay by using the word ‘most’. Most jewish people are smart. Most White people are Catholic. Most governments suck.

Unless you say, ALL black people are bad or something dumb like that. Then I would call that sterotyping.

PaulT prejudism means Pre Judging. I’m not prejudging, I’ve judged and been around the people that I’m judging, and I’m judging after I’ve met them, talked to them, and found out how stupid they are. Not all people from NH are dumb, but a lot of them are. I went to New York city, and they are much smarter. Would you call that prejudging? Nope, cause I have been there, spoken to the people, and found out they are intelligent.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Way to be an ignorant white guy who doesn’t know an asshole from a hole in the ground.

I’m not sure why you’re flaming me instead of responding with a scathing witticism. Perhaps you are wondering what prejuidice means? My point is that saying everyone in a certain community is a racist is making a generalization. It’s the same kind of generalization that white people in the boonies of New Hampshire make when they say all black people are crack dealers.[/quote]

But what if all the black people are crack dealers…? We shouldn’t be judging by what people have to say, we should study and analyze if the information is correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“Shinoda, post:10, topic:3300”]I didn’t write that list, I saw it and decided to post.

End of story.[/quote]

Bullshit! That’s not the end of the story.

The point that I am trying to make with this post is that these stereotypes exist only because people are uneducated. If more people understood other cultures then these stereotypes would become irrelevant and fade into obscurity.

This is wrong because pattern recognition is not racism/sexism/etc… and is a part of how our brains function, and stereotypes are not always negative.

Read full topic

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

To be honest, if you clarified them better, most of those would be true. And stereotyping is part of human nature, we observe several people/objects and find something they have in common. Its an instinct.

Agreed.
Pattern recognition is not racism/sexism/etc… and is a part of how our brains function.

item.title: Stereotypes
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I think this thread is stereotyping all stereotypes as stupid. Stereotypes can be useful.

When you see a mexican guy climbing around on top of somebodies roof, you don’t think "Hmm, he’s probably from MIT doing research on the properties of different tile collusion methods, you think, “Hmm, he’s probably an illegal immigrant.” So instead of being upset and calling the authorities when he falls and breaks his leg, you take another hit off the bong and lay back, wondering where the hell you left your lucky bufallo nickel.

Read full topic
